overview: In the harsh life of the streets, on his dark side, struggling to survive. A group of men are kicking the street, they have been together for a long time, (Lazaro) With a strong appearance and personality, resentful of society, He kills his frustrations with alcohol, (Solomon) will arrive at the lair fleeing from something dark, They find a day to another indigent, (Arturo) a little younger, they join their group together with (Pedro), who is sick, and (Japa Japa) a young man whose mind is in another world, remembering his past lives without return.
title: What the Waters Left Behind
